text: navu ratri hagu hagalannu eradu puravegalagisiddeve mattu nivu nim'ma odeyana anugrahavannu arasabekendu hagu varsagala sankhye mattu (itara) pramanagalannu tiliyabekendu, navu ratriya puraveyannu mandagolisi, hagalina puraveyannu ujvalavagisiddeve. Mattu navu ellavannu savistaravagi vivarisiddeve
